sections.introduction.title: Introduction
sections.introduction.content: FindClass.nz ('we', 'our', or 'us') uses cookies, session storage, and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience on our website. This Cookie Policy explains what these technologies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding their use.
sections.whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies & Storage?
sections.whatAreCookies.content: Cookies and similar storage technologies are small text files or data stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit a website. They help the website function properly and provide a better user experience. We use both cookies and session storage - session storage only保存 data during your browser session and is automatically cleared when you close the tab.
sections.typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.typesOfCookies.content: We use the following types of cookies:
sections.types.essential.title: Essential Cookies
sections.types.essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as page navigation, security, and network management.
sections.types.essential.examples: Examples: Session ID, login authentication, security tokens.
sections.types.performance.title: Performance Cookies
sections.types.performance.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information about page visits and error reports.
sections.types.performance.examples: Examples: Google Analytics, page load times, error tracking.
sections.types.functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
sections.types.functionality.description: These cookies allow us to remember choices you make (such as language preferences, region, or customization choices) and provide enhanced features.
sections.types.functionality.examples: Examples: Language settings, region selection, saved preferences.
sections.types.targeting.title: Targeting/Advertising Cookies
sections.types.targeting.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement.
sections.types.targeting.examples: Examples: Ad personalization, social media integration, retargeting pixels.
sections.howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
sections.howWeUse.content: We use cookies for the following purposes:
sections.howWeUse.item1: To provide and maintain our services
sections.howWeUse.item2: To remember your preferences and settings
sections.howWeUse.item3: To analyze how our website is used and improve user experience
sections.cookieManagement.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
sections.cookieManagement.content: You have the right to accept, decline, or customize your cookie preferences. You can manage your preferences through:
sections.cookieManagement.item1: The cookie consent banner that appears when you first visit our website
sections.cookieManagement.item2: Your browser settings (most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies)
sections.cookieManagement.item3: Our Cookie Preferences tool in the cookie consent banner
sections.thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.thirdParty.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these third-party cookies. Third parties may use cookies for their own purposes, and we recommend reviewing their privacy policies for more information.
sections.updates.title: Updates to This Policy
sections.updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our business practices. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a revised 'Last updated' date.
